title.rendered: Argos Home Miami Oak Effect Dining Table & 4 Grey Chairs

excerpt.rendered:
Bring the family together. The Argos Home oak-effect dining table finish offers a warm, relaxed style. And the easy-clean, scratch-resistant table top is brilliantly kid-proof. Its 4 faux leather chairs have a solid real wood frame with comfy padded seats and a supportive midback design. The only thing left to do is decide what’s for dinner.

product details:

Table:

  • Simple Table size (H30 inches, W42 inches, L 60 inches)
    Width: 3.5 fit
    Length 5.0fit
    Height: 2.5fit
  • Wood effect table with wood effect legs.
  • table top High Gloss finish.
  • Self-assembly – 2 people recommended.

Chair:

  • Includes 4 chairs.
  • Size of each chair H40 inches, W22inches , D22 inches
  • Seat height 20 inches.
  • Solid wood frame with solid wood legs.
  • Fabric seat Juth.
  • Pre Assembled
  • The maximum user weight per chair is 130kg.

“Note: all our products are made to order.”
